item.title: Report X-2025020557
item.description:
Report X-2025020557

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-15T03:17:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-31
  • City: INDIANAPOLIS
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: A fiberboard box with signs of a release was found during sort operations at the INDH location. The fiberboard box contained a plastic jerrycan and the screw cap was loose causing the release. All the contents were placed into a steel salvage package and a new declaration will be obtained for movement.
